name: BubbleStar
description:
This is our submission into the Tilted Game Jam! "Plump Bubble" was the theme, which we achieved by making a bubble which grows more plump as you play! :) 

Chaotic - character enters 'chaos mode' when he grabs a star! 

Long - The character longs for his place among the stars! (Its in the intro)

Star - The bubble flies among the stars, and there is a star powerup! 

Fast - Fans and stars speed up the player! 

Car - Cars fall from the sky! 

Sparking - Evil toasters shoot sparks! 

Mouse - Mice are driving cars in the sky for some reason! 

Night - Our game takes place at night! 

+1 point for playing the cool monkey game :)
